#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<malloc.h>
int main(void)
{
    int t,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int *arr=(int *)malloc(sizeof(int)*n);
        int ans=0,k,i,j;
        for(i=0;i<n;++i)
            scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
        for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
            for(j=i+1;j<n;++j)
            if(arr[i]>arr[j])
            {
                arr[i]^=arr[j];
                arr[j]^=arr[i];
                arr[i]^=arr[j];
            }
            j=n-1;
            while(j>1)
            {
                i=j-1;
                k=0;
                while(i>k)
                {
                    if(arr[k]+arr[i]>arr[j])
                    {
                        ans+=i-k;
                        i--;
                    }
                    else k++;
                }
                j--;
            }
            printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
        return 0;
}
